orig_text:
and if the request contains the Accept- headers

     Accept: text/html:q=1.0, */*:q=0.8
     Accept-Language: en;q=1.0, fr;q=0.5
correct_text:
and if the request contains the Accept- headers

     Accept: text/html;q=1.0, */*;q=0.8
     Accept-Language: en;q=1.0, fr;q=0.5
notes: (quality) parameter must be separated by ";" instead of ":".
